entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
